archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Customer Experience Maturity Assessment
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This a specific process of the General Maturity Assessment processes that are in Common Enterprise Processes in the Enterprise domain.

properties.value: The Customer Experience Maturity Assessment process is a specific process of the General Maturity Assessment processes that are in Common Enterprise Processes in the Enterprise domain. It defines the customer maturity matrix, analyze Key Capability Indicators, and determine customer maturity level for each dimension.t
